summary: Utility module that assists in converting PyTorch model checkpoints to Flax/JAX format. It provides functions to rename parameter keys, reshape tensors as needed, and translate a PyTorch state dictionary into a nested Flax parameter dictionary using Flax traversal utilities and JAX operations.
business_intent: Enable seamless interoperability between PyTorch and Flax implementations of diffusion models by automating weight conversion, reducing manual effort for developers migrating models across frameworks.
